name: @znemz/js-common-zanity
description: sanity check rep for our *clone projects
author: Nicholas McCready

scripts.pretest:3: yarn js-common-eslint-config-react-mono-clone && yarn cpy .eslint* react/. && rimraf .eslint*
scripts.pretest:5: yarn js-common-tsconfig-mono-react-clone && shx mv tsconfig.json tsconfig.react.mono.json
scripts.pretest:6: yarn js-common-tsconfig-react-clone && shx mv tsconfig.json tsconfig.react.json
scripts.pretest: yarn pretest:1 && yarn pretest:2 && yarn pretest:3 && yarn pretest:4 && yarn pretest:5 && yarn pretest:6 && yarn pretest:7
